description.value:
Gain +10 to Stealth Tests Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Looks like a Bronze Star with silver filigree

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Destroy a group of Kroot infiltrating into Imperial Territory.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
